After gaining no ground within the Black Fortress, Megatron X departed, 
st=
ating tot he Autobots that they now knew whee it was and they were 
not lik=
ely to go anywhere.  It would be best to simply wait them out, 
then snatch=
 up the rogue Autobot Leader when he tried to escape.

Now nothing held him=
 there, and Megatron departed.  Leaving the 
subterrainian tunnels for the =
surface, he transforme and set his course 
for his base, far from all the c=
onflict.  Several hours later he landed 
and entered the sophisticated and =
expansie base, nearly settling in for 
rest, when he recalled his cargo.  D=
escending to the medical wing, he 
took the salvaged spark chamber and conn=
ected it to the life support 
systems and began running diaognostics on it,=
 to determine if there was 
any real spark to save.
